name: accidental
des: adj. 意外发生的，偶然的： occurring unexpectedly or by chance

name: ad-lib
des: adj. 即兴的： made or done without previous thought or preparation

name: adjunct
des: adj. 即兴的： made or done without previous thought or preparation

name: automatic
des: adj. 自发的，情不自禁的： acting or done spontaneously or unconsciously

name: extemporize
des: v. 即席表现： to do or perform (something) without prior preparation or practice

name: fluky
des: adj. 侥幸的： coming or happening by good luck especially unexpectedly

name: impromptu
des: adj. 即席的，即兴的： composed without previous preparation

name: improvise
des: v. 即兴而作： to invent, compose, or perform with little or no preparation

name: intuitive
des: adj. 直觉的： knowing or perceiving by intuition

name: insight
des: n. 深刻的理解： an instance of apprehending the true nature of a thing, especially through intuitive understanding

name: offhand
des: adj. 即兴的，没有准备的： without premeditation or preparation

name: spontaneous
des: adj. 自发的，不经思索的： acting or activated without apparent thought or deliberation

name: shrink
des: v. 本能性地退却（如因遇到使人惊恐的某物）；退缩： to draw back instinctively, as from something alarming; recoil

name: unwitting
des: adj. 偶然的，并非有意的： happening by chance; not intended

name: calculated
des: adj. 经过计算（成败得失）的，经过深思熟虑的： engaged in, undertaken, or displayed after reckoning or estimating the statistical probability of success or failure

name: commonsensical
des: adj. 符合常识的，有依据的：displaying common sense，based on sound reasoning or information

name: contemplate
des: vt./vi. 沉思，仔细思索： to view or consider with continued attention

name: deliberate
des: adj. 深思熟虑的： characterized by or resulting from careful and thorough consideration

name: measured
des: adj. 深思熟虑的，审慎的： deliberated, calculated

name: meditate
des: vt. 思索，沉思： to focus one’s thoughts on

name: premeditate
des: vi. 预先考虑： to think, consider, or deliberate beforehand

name: reflect
des: vi. 思考： to think seriously

name: ruminate
des: vt. 沉思： to go over in the mind repeatedly and often casually or slowly
